I do not recommend this doctor. Surprised to see so many positive reviews. ******* ** *** ************ he caused a wound on the lips but claims its because of antibiotics. Also he needs to learn to write number 5 better. The pharmacist is puzzled to see novomox 120 prescribed and doctor claims he prescribed novomox 500. Never seen such a 5 written in my 43 years of existence.
reply_text:
Me too sir surprised to see your negative review here even after explaining the concern issue. 
Firstly we‚Äôve done a surgical extraction of wisdom tooth for your daughter, it‚Äôs not a simple tooth removal as it is impacted in the bone. That‚Äôs why you need a faciomaxillary surgeon and you approached me. Thank you for that. You would‚Äôve known better if you stayed there during treatment time. We had to call you after surgery and you showed up after 20mins. 
Secondly, It‚Äôs a not WOUND due to instrument mistreatment, it‚Äôs an ulcer which is common in few patients due to antibiotics.
Thirdly, coming to incompetence in my work, no need to explain to you as you‚Äôve already stated 1st line in your review regarding positive feedbacks from our patients. 
Finally, I‚Äôll try to learn writing number 5!!!!

review: Dr. Anwar was really good in explaining the issue behind my wife's tooth pain in  detail and also did proper dental checkup to check other teeth as well. We went for cleaning,filling and tooth removal from him and he is did entire treatment without any pain. Also he is very soft spoken and even if you face any problem after the treatment he is just a call away. Will surely recommend him for all the dental related issues.

review:
Had very good experience with Anwar sir, the way he explained the problems of teeth, treated root canal issues with almost no pain, a very clean and smooth transition. Value proposition for treatment was highly appreciated.
Thanks a lot Anwar Sir for awareness on Importance of teeth and how to protect valuable asset - (teeth) by regular check ups(every 6 months)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor explained the treatment well in advance before starting with it. It was a painless procedure as I was under anaesthesia and lasted for 30-40 minutes. 
However, the post operative pain and discomfort is there which was also explained by the doctor that it would be there for next 1 week. 
Overall, it was a pleasant experience and I would recommend this clinic/doctor to anyone with dental issues.

review: Tooth extractions, especially those involving surgeries are always bad experiences irrespective of how good your doctor is. However, I'm fairly confident that Dr. Anwar performed my tooth extraction (both upper and lower, with the lower requiring a surgical extraction) as painlessly as possible. Also, the doctor is prompt in responding to queries on WhatsApp.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Will like to share experience of my left tooth extraction.... Dr. Syed patiently heard all my issues and was very thoughtful to identify the actual cause... He was approachable and ensured to suggest all the possible options for me to decide.... Even during the surgery there was minimal pain and his medication ensured faster recovery as well. Before the surgery... I was well informed on the effects, so was mentally well prepared as well... Thanks to Dr. Syed and will definitely recommend him...

Visited for toothache for my diabetic mother. Since the teeth were mobile, extraction was advised by the doctor and post the procedure she is feeling better. Very good experience and would like to recommend to visit the clinic for any dental issues.
